"Defeat the $(0)": "Begin the assault on the $(0)!"
"Attack the $(0)!"
"The assault on the Angel has begun. The first wave starts with the A.I.S creating a diversion for Eva-01."
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_102 The target will change shape once it starts its attacks. It will then deploy a barrier, called an A.T. Field."
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_103 If you can break the A.T. Field by attacking it repeatedly, you'll get a chance to attack it directly!"
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_104 Use the Counter Shield to counter the target's attacks."
"/atime5.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_105 Support batteries are deployed to the North, East, and West positions. Prepare for powerful support bombardment."

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_106 We'll be commencing the bombardment shortly. Please be advised, that if the support batteries are destroyed, the surrounding areas will be seriously damaged."
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_107 Firing initiated! Prepare for the counterattack!"
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_108 The core is exposed, now's our chance!"
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_109 A support battery has been destroyed! The area surrounding it was destroyed as well!"
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_110 We're preparing to fire our bombardment from our second position! Once we're ready, we'll bombard the target with a powerful attack!"

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_111 Another battery destroyed!
Please resume your assault."
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_112 Preparing our last bombardment position!"
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_113 All support batteries have been destroyed!"
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_114 I'm detecting a high energy reading coming from inside the target!"

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navi09_prism_115 Its target is Eva-01!
Everyone, good luck!"

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navipr01_prism_102 Wha-what is that!?
I've never seen anything like it!"

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navipr02_prism_101 Shinji, calm down.
Just believe in the ARKS!"
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navipr01_prism_101 Uwaaaa!!"
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navipr02_prism_102 Scrap the mission plan! Prioritize the pilot's safety! Emergency plug ejection!"

"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navipr02_prism_103 We did it!
Shinji, are you ready?"
"/atime2.5 /voice11_voice_navipr01_prism_103 Ready!"
"The operation to destroy the Angel is complete! Thank you for your cooperation!"
